Smartcard Comments

Smartcards are available from the ticket office, and can be topped up there or using the ticket machine.

Penalty Fares

Penalty fares apply for TP

Facilities

Car Park

Yes

Seated Area

Yes

Waiting Room

A heated waiting room is located on the station concourse.

Station Buffet

Yes

Refreshments are available from the coffee shop on the station concourse.

Toilets

Yes

The toilets are located on Platform 3.

Accessible toilets

Yes

The accessible toilets are located on Platform 3, these toilets are operated by a radar key.

Yes

Yes

Shops

Yes

There is a shop located on the station concourse.

Rail replacement locations

Pick up/drop off at the service bus stops on the main road outside the station.

For more information, please see here.

Customer Help Points

Yes

Help Points are available in the Booking Hall, on platforms 4/5 and adjacent to Platform 2 to contact a member of our team in an emergency or for information when the ticket office is closed. When using the Help Point our CCTV will be monitoring your position for the duration of the call.

7

Accessible Spaces Note

Parking is free for registered disabled customers parking in disabled spaces displaying a valid Blue Badge Permit. Blue Badge holders must also register their permit at bit.ly/tpebluebadge in order to obtain free parking.

Step Free Access

This station is category A. Level access is provided from the station entrance to all platforms. This station is staffed for all services.There are train boarding ramps available at this station, and they are also carried on board all TransPennine Express trains.

Please be aware that this station has no tactile paving on the platform edge.
